info.name: Practical style for Nifflas forum
info.description:
Always visible Quote button, no empty space between posts, background picture barely visible between posts to reduce distraction.

Known issue: Opening the Quote button dropdown menu would be tricky on a touch device. I'll think about how to fix it if you want.
info.additionalInfo: Revision 3 - fixed Quote dropdown to show 1st item, not "Quote" specifically.
